results.definition: the entrance (the space in a wall) through which you enter or leave a room or building; the space that a door can close
examples: he stuck his head in the doorway

results.definition: anything providing a means of access (or escape)
examples: we closed the door to Haitian immigrants
education is the door to success

results.definition: a room that is entered via a door
examples: his office is the third door down the hall on the left

results.definition: a structure where people live or work (usually ordered along a street or road)
examples: they live two doors up the street from us

results.definition: a swinging or sliding barrier that will close the entrance to a room or building or vehicle
examples: he slammed the door as he left
